Package com.piggybox.bags

User Defined Functions for processing data bags.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountEachBy
    Generate the number of occurrence times of each tuple in a bag regarding to specific field.
    JoinEachBy
    Given a bag, return a new bag of one-field tuples which are joint by @sep.
    MergeTuples
    Merge all tuples in a bag into an single new tuple.
    NthTupleFromBag
    Returns the Nth (indexing from zero) tuple from a bag.
    SumEachBy
    Generate the sum of a value field with respect to a key field in a bag of tuples.

Package com.piggybox.bags Description

User Defined Functions for processing data bags.
